data.eml:eml: Hippocampusjapapigu, a new species of pygmy seahorse from Japan, with a redescription of H. pontohi (Teleostei, Syngnathidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Short, Graham, Smith, Richard, Motomura, Hiroyuki, Harasti, David, Hamilton, Healy (2018): Hippocampusjapapigu, a new species of pygmy seahorse from Japan, with a redescription of H. pontohi (Teleostei, Syngnathidae). ZooKeys 779: 27-49, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.779.24799, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.779.24799
